product_title: Gold Pots and Pans Set, Hybrid Hammered Stainless Steel, 10PC Nonstick Kitchen Cookware Sets w/Frying pan, Non Toxic, Oven Safe & Compatible with All Stovetops
about_product: 『NONSTICK PERFORMANCE』Hybrid technologies deliver ultra-smooth food release, healthier cooking with less oil, and effortless cleanup—durable enough for metal utensils
『SAFE & NON-TOXIC』 Free from PFOA, PFAS, lead, and cadmium, offering a healthier, eco-conscious choice for you and your family
『UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY』 Designed with induction-ready, high-conductivity bases, this set works seamlessly on all stovetops—gas, electric, ceramic, halogen, and induction
『EASY CARE』 Engineered with high-performance nonstick coatings and dishwasher-safe construction for quick cleanup; oven-safe up to 500°F for added versatility
『COMPLETE 10-PIECE SET』Includes: 8" & 10" frying pan, 1.5qt. &2.5 qt. saucepan with lid, 6 qt. dutch oven with lid, 3 qt. sauté pan with lid, and a Designed Package

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #218,144 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining)  #791 in Kitchen Cookware Sets

top_reviews.review_title: Use it to make cooking easier.
top_reviews.review_comment: When I used this pot for the first time, I wanted to fry a sun egg on a whim. I was a little worried that it would be a mess like before. As a result, the egg slipped down and formed obediently in the pot. When turning over, it was even a little easy to surprise. From that day on, I used it for breakfast. I almost didn't need oil. The eggs I made were full of aroma, and of course there were ham slices. I am very satisfied that its non stick pot material is well processed. Children say that the dishes it makes are better than those bought outside. On weekends, I also use it to stir fry vegetables or fry fish. The heat is just right, and there will be no half-burnt and half raw. Of course, the fish won't stick to the pot either. After dinner, I am no longer afraid of washing the pot. I just rinse it and it will be clean. Now, every time I walk into the kitchen and pick up this pot, I feel that cooking has become pleasant and comfortable, as if I have a little more happiness in life.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Love it! Perfect for small family's everyday use
top_reviews.review_comment: I received a 10 inch hammered finish frying pan with Stainless Steel on the bottom and nonstick on the cooking surface. This pan looks great and cooks well. The hammered finish gives it a nice look, and it feels solid and just the right weight in my hand, not too heavy at all. I followed the instruction and seasoned it before using. Nothing sticks to it, cleanup is super easy. I’ve made eggs, handmade pancakes, and some hashbrowns in it, and they came out great. It works fine on my gas stove, and I like that it can go in the oven too if I need it to. The handle stays cool enough to hold, and the size is perfect for our small family's everyday use. It heats up quickly and doesn’t warp or wobble. It’s just a simple, well-made pan that does what it’s supposed to. I use it almost every day, and it’s been wonderful so far.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This pan totally surprised me for the price. It looks high end with that hammered stainless steel finish, and it actually cooks beautifully. I’ve been using it almost every day for the past two weeks，eggs, stir fry, pancakes，and nothing sticks. The surface gives you that crispy sear like stainless steel but still wipes clean like a nonstick.The handle stays cool, and it feels nicely balanced in the hand. I even tossed it in the oven once for finishing off chicken thighs, and it handled the heat just fine.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: The 12-inch stainless steel pan required simple assembly, and it is ready to use. I like its solid and heavy-duty construction and quality in my hands. I used ir cooking a couple of ribeye steaks. I like its evenly the pan heated. It’s made of stainless steel with no coating (free from PFOA, PFAS, lead, and cadmium), it still nonstick-like performance once the pan was properly preheated. The steaks seared beautifully, developed a perfect crust, and slid right off the surface without sticking. And the pan is oven-safe, I was able to transfer it straight into the oven to finish cooking. Cleaning is easy by hand or dishwasher. Pros: - Sturdy, heavy-duty stainless steel build - 100% free from harmful coatings (PFOA, PFAS, lead, cadmium) - Provides excellent nonstick performance - Oven-safe, versatile for stovetop-to-oven cooking - 12-inch size is perfect for steaks, chicken, or family meals
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: I use it for cooking every day
top_reviews.review_comment: I got this hammered stainless steel pan a few days ago, it’s been on my stove almost every day since. The look is beautiful, that hammered texture makes it feel like something from a fancy kitchen, it’s sturdy enough for daily cooking. What surprised me is how even the heat spreads, I can sauté vegetables or sear chicken without worrying about hot spots. The surface is smooth and nonstick enough for eggs to slide right off, it still gives a nice browning. Cleaning is easy too, I just rinse it and wipe with a soft sponge, no scrubbing needed. I’ve even used it in the oven for baked pasta, it came out great. It works well on my induction cooktop and heats up fast.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Everyday Pan That Covers All Bases
top_reviews.review_comment: This cookware piece has quickly become the one I grab first. It heats evenly across the bottom, so nothing burns in one corner while staying raw in another. I’ve done everything from fried eggs to thick cuts of steak, and it handled both without issues. Being able to start on the stove and finish in the oven at higher temps adds flexibility, especially when cooking meats that need a sear before baking. I also like not worrying about toxic coatings, which was a big reason I switched. Food still slides off easily, and I don’t spend forever scrubbing.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This Stainless Steel Cookware Set 🍳has been a wonderful addition to my kitchen. The nonstick surface works perfectly for cooking a variety of meals—from searing steaks to making pancakes—and everything cooks evenly without sticking. The pans are durable, sturdy, and high-quality, yet still very easy to use and clean, which makes cooking much more convenient. I also appreciate that they are oven safe and compatible with all stovetops, giving me flexibility in how I prepare meals. Overall, this set combines style, durability, and practicality, and I’m very happy with how it performs in everyday cooking.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: My mom has been praising it since using it. She says it doesn't stick to the pan when frying eggs, and even with minimal oil, they cook beautifully. She says it heats evenly, so she doesn't have to constantly stir the food, which makes it even more fragrant. It's also easy to clean because it doesn't stick, just rinse with dish soap and water, no scrubbing required. It has a nice, solid feel and feels classy in the kitchen. My mom especially loves using it to fry fish; it comes out whole and crisp, which really makes her feel good while cooking!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025
